Abstract: What will the weather be like in 2100?     Don't laugh. While forecasting the next century in any field is a dicey exercise, climate experts have more tools than most prognosticators.
LeadParagraph: What will the weather be like in 2100?

Headline.Main: Visions: Biology; Turning Up the Heat: Two Forecasts for Earth 2100
